Ingredients.7: 0.25 cup all-purpose flour, or as needed

Ingredients.8: 2 cups vegetable oil for frying, or as needed

Ingredients.10: 0.5 cup honey, or more to taste

Ingredients.11: 0.5 cup white sugar, or more to taste

Ingredients.12: 1 tablespoon rainbow nonpareil sprinkles, or to taste

Directions.1: Beat eggs, 1/4 cup white sugar, 1/4 cup vegetable oil, and vanilla extract together in a bowl; stir in baking powder. Slowly stir flour, about 1 tablespoon at a time, into egg mixture until a soft dough forms. Roll dough into small balls.

Directions.2: Heat 2 cups vegetable oil in a large saucepan to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) or until you see little waves on the bottom of the saucepan.

Directions.3: Working in small batches, fry dough balls in hot oil until lightly browned, 2 to 3 minutes per batch. Transfer struffoli to a paper towel-lined plate using a slotted spoon.

Directions.4: Heat honey in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Slowly mix 1/2 cup sugar, a few tablespoons at a time, into honey until sugar is melted and glaze is smooth, about 5 minutes.

Directions.5: Transfer struffoli to a large bowl and pour glaze on top; toss quickly to evenly coat before glaze hardens.

Directions.6: Arrange struffoli into a tower shape or Christmas tree shape on a serving plate. Sprinkle nonpareil sprinkles over struffoli.
